codeReview.summary: Implementation matches the feature requirements and VAL-BUG-001: `--json` default was changed to undefined, preAction only bridges when `json === true`, env restoration logic remains intact, parse-state tests were added, and a changeset was included.

sharedStateObservations.observation: `library-worker` verification guidance is partially out of sync with mission-level known issues: it mandates unconditional `bun run test` and `bun run check`, while mission guidance documents known pre-existing full-suite failures and `bun run check` instability.

summary: Reviewed feature os-323-json-default via feature metadata, worker handoff, commit diff, transcript skeleton, and shared-state docs. No code defects found; implementation satisfies required behavior and includes test and changeset updates.
